com.sonf.core.future

接口 IOFuture

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ICloseFuture, IConnectFuture, IWriteFuture
    所有已知实现类:
    CloseFuture, ConnectFuture, DefaultIOFuture, WriteFuture

    public interface IOFuture

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void await()
      Wait for the asynchronous operation to complete.
      boolean await(long timeoutMillis)
      Wait for the asynchronous operation to complete with the specified timeout.
      boolean await(long timeout, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
      Wait for the asynchronous operation to complete with the specified timeout.
      void awaitUninterruptibly()
      Wait for the asynchronous operation to complete uninterruptibly.
      java.lang.Throwable getException() 
      IOSession getSession() 
      boolean isDone() 
      void removeListener()
      Removes an existing listener
      void setException(java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Sets the exception as result
      void setListener(IoFutureListener listener)
      Set a listener which is notified when this future is completed.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSession

        IOSession getSession()
        返回:
        the IOSession which is associated with this future.

      • setException

        void setException(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Sets the exception as result
        参数:
        exception -

      • getException

        java.lang.Throwable getException()
        返回:
        null if the operation is not finished or if the operation is successful, otherwise return the exception

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        返回:
        true if the operation is completed whether or not successfully.

      • awaitUninterruptibly

        void awaitUninterruptibly()
        Wait for the asynchronous operation to complete uninterruptibly.

      • await

        void await()
    throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait for the asynchronous operation to complete. Return when the operation is completed or interrupted.
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while waiting

      • await

        boolean await(long timeout,
              java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait for the asynchronous operation to complete with the specified timeout.
        参数:
        timeout - The maximum delay to wait
        unit - the type of unit for the delay
        返回:
        true if the operation is completed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while waiting

      • await

        boolean await(long timeoutMillis)
       throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait for the asynchronous operation to complete with the specified timeout.
        参数:
        timeoutMillis - The maximum milliseconds to wait
        返回:
        true if the operation is completed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while waiting

      • setListener

        void setListener(IoFutureListener listener)
        Set a listener which is notified when this future is completed. If the listener is added after the completion, the listener is directly notified.
        参数:
        listener - The listener to set

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes an existing listener
